summary: The General Services Administration (GSA) leases space for federal agencies. GSA leases are stable, but they come with requirements and processes that are uncommon in private-sector leases. These can lead to extra costs, which lessors pass through to GSA. We spoke to some lessors and real estate brokers who work with GSA about their concerns with these leases. For example, lengthy negotiations can increase costs...
title: GSA Leasing: Improving Stakeholder Outreach and Lease Model Evaluation Could Enhance Competition
